snippet: The Navy will soon start giving Breathalyzer tests to many sailors before they report to work aboard ships under a new program that will eventually spread to the Marine Corps.
abstract: United States Navy announces plans to start giving Breathalyzer tests to many sailors before they report to work aboard ships under a program that will eventually spread to the Marine Corps.
lead_paragraph: The Navy will soon start giving Breathalyzer tests to many sailors before they report to work aboard ships under a new program that will eventually spread to the Marine Corps.
